HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to convert base64 to gif in simple steps.
steps: 1. Upload the base64 file or Click on the drop-down arrow and select dropbox/Google Drive
2. Adjust the size and style of the gif by using the options available.
3. Adjust the desired orientation of the gif.
4. Punch the save option to save the changes made.
5. Download the converted gif by punching on the download option.
6. Hurray!!! The converted base64 to gif is ready to rock.
